questions.question: Is SpongeBob depicted as a yellow, square-shaped sponge with multiple holes (pores) across his body?
questions.explanation: In Image B, SpongeBob is illustrated as a yellow character with a square shape, characteristic of his depiction in the cartoon series. His body has multiple darker circular spots, symbolizing the porous nature typical of a sponge.

questions.question: Does SpongeBob have two large, round blue eyes with black pupils?
questions.explanation: In Image B, SpongeBob is seen with two prominently large and round eyes. The main color of the eyes is blue, and they have black pupils, aligning with his well-known cartoon appearance.

questions.question: Are SpongeBob’s two front teeth clearly visible and rectangular in shape?
questions.explanation: In Image B, SpongeBob is smiling, revealing his teeth. Two large front teeth are visible, and they are rectangular, matching the classic depiction of the character from the popular series.

questions.question: Is Patrick depicted as a pink five-armed starfish with a rounded body?
questions.explanation: In Image B, Patrick is portrayed with the characteristics of a starfish—a round body and five extended appendages (arms), which is consistent with his iconic design from the animation. His body is pink, further matching his usual depiction.

questions.question: Does Patrick have a wide open mouth showing his teeth?
questions.explanation: In Image B, Patrick appears with a mouth open wide in a smile, showcasing his teeth. This expression is typical of him in the series, indicating his cheerful and laid-back personality.

questions.question: Is SpongeBob wearing a white shirt, red tie, and brown square pants?
questions.explanation: In Image B, SpongeBob is shown wearing his classic outfit: a white shirt complemented by a red tie and brown square pants, which are central elements of his traditional costume.

questions.question: Is Patrick wearing green shorts?
questions.explanation: Analyzing Image B, Patrick is not wearing green shorts, as his shorts are depicted with a pattern related to basketball, full of basketball graphics and not green in color.

questions.question: Are both SpongeBob and Patrick present in the same frame and positioned close to each other?
questions.explanation: In Image B, SpongeBob and Patrick are indeed present together, situated in proximity to one another. They are depicted interacting in a shared activity, emphasizing their friendship as shown in the series.
